short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension wallet for the zetrix chain

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing Zetrix Wallet Extension v2, the cutting-edge browser extension crafted for a seamless experience accessing Zetrix-enabled distributed applications, or "Dapps," right from your standard Chrome browser. Elevating your browsing experience, this extension proudly supports multiple blockchains.

Discover the power of Zetrix Wallet as it empowers users to effortlessly create and manage their identities. When a Dapp initiates a transaction or seeks to write to the blockchain, users enjoy a secure interface for a detailed review of transaction specifics. This meticulous review process enables users to make informed decisions, either approving or rejecting the transaction.

Unlock the potential of Zetrix Wallet Extension v2, your go-to solution for navigating the decentralized landscape with ease on the Chrome browser, now enhanced with robust support for multiple blockchains.
